title: ■■■Van Nuys   1-BEDROOM 1- BATHROOM  Apartment ■■■
posting_body: ['ERIKA', 'Rent $1,700.00', 'Deposit depending on the credit.', '-KEY FEATURES', '-Sqft Footage: 800', '-Bedrooms: 1 Bed', '-Bathrooms: 1 Bath', '-Lease', 'Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', '-Laundry: Shared', '-Floor: 1', '-Property Type: Apartment', '-------DESCRIPTION-----------', 'Casa luna offers beautifully appointed*** One bedroom apartments*** at very affordable price very spacious apartments.', 'Our units offer all the amenities you expect (gated building, gated parking, stoves, dishwashers, AC, on-site laundry...) at a fraction of what you would expect to pay!', 'Convenient to shopping centers, schools and more,*****', 'Casa luna Apartments **** should be your number 1 choice!', 'Our Property Offers', '-Pool', '-Gated Community', '-Assigned Parking', '-On-Site Office', '-On-Site Staff', '-24 Hour Camera Surveillance', '-1 Laundry Facilities (Coin Operated)', '-Green Scenery', 'Apartment Amenities:', '-Central Air or AC Wall Unit', '-New Wood Inspired Floors', '-Accent Walls', '-Spacious (1 bedroom )', '-Dishwasher', '-Ceiling fan', '- Stove', '-Walk-In Closets (varies)', '-Wall To Wall Closets', '-Over sized Living Rooms', '-Application fee$50.00', '_', '- THE PICTURES ARE FOR A SIMILAR UNIT', '**************************We pay for water and trash**************************************']
